ingredients.content: 65 g spring onions, in pieces, (approx. 6 onions)
15 g olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
450 - 500 g judion butter beans (1 x 660 g jar, drained)
1 tsp smoked paprika, plus extra for sprinkling
¼ - ½ tsp fine sea salt, to taste
¼ bunch fresh chives, finely chopped for garnish

preparations.content: Place spring onions, oil and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Sauté <b>5 min/100°C/speed <b>.
Add butter beans, lemon juice, paprika, tahini and salt then mash <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>. Heat <b>5 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Season to taste then serve garnished with a sprinkle of paprika, chopped chives and a drizzle of oil.
